description: A story about a snowman's unique breakfast choice.
title: Frosty's Flaky Feast
n_1: Frosty Snowman visits Chef Flake's breakfast diner.
c1_1: I'm looking for something special for breakfast!
c2_1: How about our special frosted flakes, Frosty?
n_2: Chef Flake presents a bowl of sparkling frosted flakes.
c1_2: They look just like me, chilly and crisp!
n_3: Frosty takes a bite, looking delighted.
c1_3: This is the perfect winter breakfast!
n_4: Frosty enjoys his breakfast, feeling energized for the day.
c1_4: I'm ready to slide into a fun day now!
